text: Hum sirf teri hi ibadat kertay hain aur sirf tujh hi say madad chahatay hain Shuroo Allah kay naam say jo bara meharban nehayat reham kerney wala hai 91.1. Qasam hai sooraj ki aur uski dhoop ki 91.2. Qasam hai chand ki jab uskay peechay ay 91.3. Qasam hai din ki jab soraj ko numaya keray 91.4. Qasam hai raat ki jab ussay dhanp lay
